title: SEE PICS: Trishala-Maanayata bond (and how!) while Sanjay Dutt is away : Celebrities, News - India Today
text:
Celebrities SEE PICS: Trishala-Maanayata bond (and how!) while Sanjay Dutt is away Trishala Dutt, the eldest daughter of Sanjay Dutt was recently seen bonding with none other than Maanayata Dutt. IndiaToday.in | Written by Devarsi Ghosh A + A - Sanjay Dutt and Maanayata Dutt (L), Trishala Dutt (R) 
That there has been something of a rift between Trishala Dutt and Maanayata Dutt is one of Bollywood's most-talked-about myths. 
Trishala is the daughter of Sanjay Dutt and his first wife, late Richa Sharma. Trishala is presently settled in the United States. Maanayata is Sanjay's third wife who got married to the Munnabhai actor in 2008. 
ALSO WATCH: Feeling of freedom is yet to sink in, says Sanju baba at India Today Conclave 2016 
Needless to say, Trishala apparently always had a problem with Maanayata. 
Well now all those rumours have been put to rest. Or it seems like that. Maanayata Dutt took to Instagram to share a selfie with Trishala and the two looked absolutely gorgeous. Have a look: A photo posted by Maanayata Dutt (@maanayata) on Feb 11, 2017 at 9:13pm PST 
Meanwhile, Trishala shared a selfie of her own. With the caption 'bunnying around' the selfie featured the two women behind the bunny filter. A photo posted by Trishala Dutt (@trishaladutt) on Feb 11, 2017 at 7:25pm PST 
Sanjay Dutt now gears up for the release of his comeback film Bhoomi this year. Ranbir Kapoor , on the other, is stepping into the shoes of Dutt in the latter's biopic directed by Rajkumar Hirani. 
ALSO READ: 10 events from Sanjay Dutt's life that MUST be there in his biopic starring Ranbir To get the latest entertainment news and gossip, follow us on Twitter @Showbiz_IT and Like us on facebook.com/IndiaToday For news and videos in Hindi, go to AajTak.in . ताज़ातरीन ख़बरों और वीडियो के लिए आजतक.इन पर आएं.
